abstract: United Nations top refugee commissioner Antonio Guterres urges European countries to accept more displaced Syrians in effort to discourage them from making perilous journey across Mediterranean Sea.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations high commissioner for refugees said that European countries must accept more Syrian refugees to dissuade them from making a perilous journey across the Mediterranean Sea.

headline.main: U.N. Official Seeks Havens for Syrians
headline.print_headline: U.N. Official Seeks Havens for Syrians

snippet: The United Nations high commissioner for refugees said that European countries must accept more Syrian refugees to dissuade them from making a perilous journey across the Mediterranean Sea.
